mapper.select: SELECT r.meeting_reply_id meetingReplyId, r.meeting_id meetingId, r.member_id memberId, r.content, r.inserted, m.nickname FROM MeetingReply r JOIN Member m ON r.member_id = m.member_id WHERE r.meeting_id = #{meetingId} ORDER BY inserted
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MeetingReply (member_id, meeting_id, content) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{meetingId}, #{content})
